name: Limited Edition Hand Tailored Kaftans
description:
We offer Kaftans that are lovingly hand made for you, using only the finest quality dead-stock fabric from the late 1960's and 70's, and super thick, heavy buttons!

Obviously this fabric is hard to come by and so once it's gone, it's really GONE! So if you would like one, don't hesitate to click buy.

Whichever picture at time of viewing is on this page, is the fabric we are producing from at this time. As and when it has ran out, we will upload a shirt in the new fabric.

For our 'one-off' tailoring service, please see our 'Exclusive Tailoring Service' page.


All our shirts come as a standard fit so no nasty surprises when you try them on. If you are a Large in your normal shirts that you buy, then you will be a large in our shirts also.

You can also buy a matching scarve wit this order at a reduced cost of £10. Just click the scarve option also. 

If you don't like the item you have purchased from us for whatever reasons, it's not a problem, bag it up and send it back and we will either exchange it for another size or give you a full refund with no messing. Simple!

*Please remember not to take tags off or wear it down the pub etc before sending back though lads.

description:

name: Quality Hand Made Vintage Fabric Scarves - Coming soon!
description:
All of our hand made scarves are tailored from dead stock fabric which like the Kaftans are limited due to the fabric being of a certain time and age - late 60's / early 70's. 

We will be stocking a full range of scarves including Polka Dot, Gingham, and Paisley fabrics.

Pics to follow.

If you order one of our Kaftans and would like a matching scarve, we can do this for an extra £10.
